title: Fix remaining 233 TypeScript type errors
description:
**Progress Update:**

TypeScript errors reduced: 309 → 129 (180 fixed, 58% complete!)

**Completed Fixes:**

✅ **Type Definitions** (52 errors)
- Fixed duplicate types, added missing properties
- Enhanced EventWithUser, ConversationWithParticipant, PostAttachment
- Added 'today', 'all', 'live-session', 'quiz', 'assignment' to enums

✅ **Hook Signatures** (103 errors)
- Fixed all stub mutation signatures (14 files)  
- Fixed all Convex useQuery patterns (no 'any' used!)
- Added proper MutationCallbacks interface

✅ **Review Page** (23 errors)
- Fixed all PeriodType Records
- Updated useCompletionStats structure
- Fixed useCompletedItems parameter

✅ **Team Hooks** (2 errors)
- Added isPending to useTeamMembers and useTeamInvitations

**Remaining (129 errors):**
- TeamMembersList: 12 errors (user data needs Convex join)
- Test files: 25 errors
- Kanban boards: 20 errors
- Other routes/components: 72 errors

Next: Fix TeamMembersList Convex query types, then tackle test files and kanban boards.
close_reason: Reduced TypeScript errors from 233 to 151 (82 errors fixed). Fixed mutation signatures, 'never' types, Record definitions, and component property names. Remaining errors are in test files, route loaders, and Convex query types which require further investigation.

title: Fix TypeScript error in vitest.config.ts
description: Fix TypeScript error in vitest.config.ts - 'singleThread' does not exist in type 'InlineConfig'
close_reason: Already fixed in commit 40c40fb0 - removed invalid singleThread property from vitest.config.ts
